identity.mission: Create a premium, high-converting landing page that feels like a tactical command center for sales.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix CRM utility with high-end fintech aesthetics.
Emotion First: Every interaction should feel 'profitable' and 'secure'.
Content is King: Direct, punchy copy. No fluff.
Zoom In: Focus on the UI details of the AI agent.
Negative Space: Luxurious spacing to separate high-density data points.

headings.usage: Use for all section titles and hero text. Tight tracking (-0.02em) for a modern feel.

body.usage: Use for descriptions, features, and UI text. Relaxed leading for readability.

buttons.primary: bg-emerald-500 hover:bg-emerald-600 text-white rounded-full px-8 py-6 text-lg font-semibold shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(16,185,129,0.3)] transition-all hover:scale-105
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-slate-700 text-slate-300 hover:border-emerald-500 hover:text-emerald-400 rounded-full px-8 py-6 text-lg transition-all

cards.feature: bg-slate-900/50 backdrop-blur-md border border-slate-800 hover:border-emerald-500/50 transition-all duration-300 rounded-2xl p-8 group relative overflow-hidden
cards.highlight: absolute inset-0 bg-gradient-to-br from-emerald-500/5 to-transparent opacity-0 group-hover:opacity-100 transition-opacity

inputs.style: bg-slate-950 border-slate-800 focus:border-emerald-500 focus:ring-emerald-500/20 rounded-xl h-12

visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise overlay on the main background to prevent banding and add 'tactile' feel.

media.icons: Use Lucide React icons. Thin strokes (1.5px) for elegance.

hero.layout: Split screen. Left: Typography + CTA. Right: 'Hero Person' image with floating UI cards (simulating the AI chat).
elements: Headline: 'Automate Sales on Telegram with AI'
Subhead: 'Connect Bitrix24, deploy AI agents, and close deals while you sleep.'

items.title: Telegram Native
items.desc: Works directly inside your customers' favorite app.

how_it_works.layout: Step-by-step vertical timeline with connecting lines (The 'Tracing Beam' concept).

cta_footer.text: Ready to multiply your sales team?

accessibility.contrast: Ensure all text on dark backgrounds is at least slate-300 or lighter.

instructions_to_main_agent: Use the 'Emerald Graphite' theme strictly. No random blues or purples.
Implement the 'Bento Grid' for the features section.
Use the provided image URLs for the hero and background textures.
Ensure the 'Login' CTA is prominent and leads to /login.
Use 'Plus Jakarta Sans' for all headings to match the brand.
Create a 'Navbar' component that is sticky and glassmorphic.
universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts.
Create depth through layered design elements.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
